I really enjoyed making this set, colourful and plenty to do.
column2: Not sure why Lego wanted to call this Heartlake City Restaurant.&nbsp
column3: The rooftops scream Itlay or Tuscany,&nbsp
column4: typical colourful ridges, but no doubt Lego had their reasons.

column1: I really liked the colour combinations for this set.
column2: Toffee, bright light or cool yellow and white worked well together. There was a part that I hadn&#39

column4: I do hope Lego will expand the colour range for this part, it could be useful&nbsp
column5: addition for those who make MOCs.

column2: t quite go with the cool yellow. That was a personal preference, others may be happy to keep the one provided.

column3: When I discovered where it went in the build I swopped it for a red one.&nbsp

column1: I thought using purple ice cream scoops for bunches of grapes was good.
column2: I actually moved the green plant element forward one so that the grapes hung over the roof edge better.&nbsp
column3: I also intend to add another two at the back and have bought the necessary parts to do so.&nbsp
column4: I feel it adds that little finishing touch and covers the roof a little better.

column1: All in all a really great set and I would recommend buying this.
